thread.title: Gloria & Andre
thread.title_full: R&G Brenner Income Tax reviewed by Gloria & Andre

author: Gloria & Andre
title: Gloria & Andre
text: I had a wonderful experience with Rene. He gave me options on how to file my taxes and save the most amount of money. I have recommended him to a few others and hope they use his services. I will definitely come back next year to file my returns with him.
